text: The exhibition, which depicts the 40 years of the unblemished political career of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe will be held until 20th August.The inauguration ceremony of the exhibition was also participated by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, and Former President Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunge.The Heta Dakina Ranil (Ranil, the leader who sees tomorrow) photographic exhibition was inaugurated this evening (17th Aug.) at BMICH under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena. The exhibition, which depicts the 40 years of the unblemished political career of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe will be held until 20th August.The inauguration ceremony of the exhibition was also participated by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, and Former President Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunge.
title: Heta Dakina Ranil exhibition at BMICH
